questions.text: How many service calls do you handle per week?
questions.description: This helps us understand your business volume and capacity
Identifying key pain points helps us focus on the right solutions

questions.text: How do you currently manage emergency calls?
questions.description: Emergency response efficiency directly impacts customer satisfaction

questions.text: What percentage of calls come outside business hours?
questions.description: After-hours demand affects staffing and revenue opportunities

questions.text: Which services are most profitable for your business?
questions.description: Understanding your profit centers helps optimize resource allocation

questions.text: What would improve your customer satisfaction most?
questions.description: Customer satisfaction drives repeat business and referrals
